But <S%G1161><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, standing up <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5685><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the eleven <S%G1733><s%>, lifted up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G669><s%> <S%G5662><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Ye men <S%G435><s%> of Judaea <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G537><s%> ye that dwell <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> at Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%>, be <S%G2077><s%> <S%G5749><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hearken <S%G1801><s%> <S%G5663><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> words <S%G4487><s%>:

For <S%G1063><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G3184><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> drunken <S%G3184><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> suppose <S%G5274><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, seeing <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> but the third <S%G5154><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> of the day <S%G2250><s%>.
But <S%G235><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> that which was spoken <S%G2046><s%> <S%G5772><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Joel <S%G2493><s%>;

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a prophet <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> had sworn <S%G3660><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with an oath <S%G3727><s%> to him <S%G846><s%>, that of <S%G1537><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, he would raise up <S%G450><s%> <S%G5693><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> to sit <S%G2523><s%> <S%G5658><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> throne <S%G2362><s%>;

This <S%G5126><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> hath <S%G450><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> raised up <S%G450><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, whereof <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> <S%G5748><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> being <S%G5312><s%> by the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> exalted <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5685><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5631><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>, he hath shed forth <S%G1632><s%> <S%G5656><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> let <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5720><s%> assuredly <S%G806><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> hath made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%> that same <S%G5126><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> have crucified <S%G4717><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, both <S%G2532><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> this, they were pricked <S%G2660><s%> <S%G5648><s%> in their heart <S%G2588><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the emissarys <S%G652><s%>, Men <S%G435><s%> and brethren <S%G80><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall we do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5692><s%>?
